==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|こ|さめ|yomi=kun}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|小|tr1=ko|t1=small, light, slight|雨|tr2=same|t2=rain|lang=ja}}. The medial -s- either represents [[w:epenthesis|epenthesis]] between two vowels or, more likely, is a reflex of an older form of the word {{m|ja|雨|tr=ame||rain}} only maintained in fossilized compounds. See also {{m|ja|春雨|tr=harusame||spring rain}} and {{m|ja|稲|tr=shine||rice}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こさめ}}

# light [[rain]], [[drizzle]]

#*: 霡霂 兼名苑云、細雨一名霡霂、'''小雨'''也、麥木二音、已上本注、和名'''古佐女'''
